Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 38-2012. A 60-year-old 
man with abdominal pain and aortic aneurysms.
Stone JH(1), Patel VI, Oliveira GR, Stone JR.

Author information:
(1)Division of Rheumatology, Allergy, and Immunology, Department of Medicine, 
Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
